text.section: If, within the period required in a notice and demand for a return, a person or governmental unit fails to file the return and pay the tax due, the tax collector shall assess a penalty of 25% of the tax assessed under § 13-402 of this title.
A penalty under this section is in addition to the penalty provided under § 13-701 of this subtitle.
